column1: A memorial service will be held on Friday
column3: 2015 at 10 am at Johnson and Robison Funeral Home with Harold Douga officiating and a requiem mass at 2 pm at Our Lady of Prompt Succor Catholic Church with Father Thompson officiating. The family will receive friends Friday
column5: 2015 from 9-10 am at the funeral home. Cremation has been entrusted to Johnson and Robison Funeral Home.
